statements: SELECT * FROM CostSavingOpportunities;
SELECT product_name, supplier_name, purchase_price FROM CostSavingOpportunities WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT * FROM CostSavingOpportunities WHERE supplier_name ='ABC Supplier' ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, SUM(purchase_price) AS total_purchase_price FROM CostSavingOpportunities GROUP BY supplier_name;
SELECT DISTINCT supplier_name FROM CostSavingOpportunities;
SELECT * FROM CostSavingOpportunities ORDER BY purchase_date DESC, purchase_price ASC
SELECT id, product_name, quantity FROM CostSavingOpportunities WHERE supplier_name = 'ABC Company'
SELECT supplier_name, COUNT(*) AS total_purchases FROM CostSavingOpportunities GROUP BY supplier_name ORDER BY total_purchases DESC
SELECT product_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity_sold FROM CostSavingOpportunities GROUP BY product_name
SELECT * FROM CostSavingOpportunities WHERE purchase_price > 100 AND quantity >= 5
SELECT * FROM CostSavingOpportunities
SELECT product_name, cost_savings FROM CostSavingOpportunities WHERE cost_savings > 500
SELECT supplier_name, efficiency_rating FROM SupplyChainEfficiency ORDER BY efficiency_rating DESC
SELECT * FROM SupplyChainEfficiency WHERE last_updated >= '2021-01-01'
SELECT product_name, cost_savings, analysis_date FROM CostSavingOpportunities WHERE analysis_date < '2022-06-01'
SELECT product_name, cost_savings FROM CostSavingOpportunities WHERE cost_savings > 1000 ORDER BY cost_savings DESC
SELECT * FROM SupplyChainEfficiency WHERE efficiency_rating BETWEEN 3.5 AND 4.5 ORDER BY last_updated DESC
SELECT product_name, cost_savings, analysis_date FROM CostSavingOpportunities WHERE analysis_date >= '2022-01-01' AND analysis_date <= '2022-12-31' ORDER BY analysis_date ASC
SELECT supplier_name, efficiency_rating FROM SupplyChainEfficiency ORDER BY supplier_name ASC
SELECT * FROM CostSavingOpportunities WHERE product_name LIKE '%software%' ORDER BY id ASC
SELECT * FROM cost_saving_opportunities;
SELECT id, product_name, cost FROM cost_saving_opportunities WHERE cost > 1000;
SELECT product_name, cost, savings FROM cost_saving_opportunities WHERE savings >= 500;
SELECT id, delivery_time, efficiency_rating FROM supply_chain_efficiency ORDER BY efficiency_rating DESC;
SELECT analysis_date, insights FROM analytics_data WHERE analysis_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, product_name, cost, savings FROM cost_saving_opportunities ORDER BY savings DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT product_name, cost FROM cost_saving_opportunities WHERE cost > 1000 ORDER BY cost ASC
SELECT * FROM supply_chain_efficiency WHERE delivery_time BETWEEN 1 AND 5
SELECT id, analysis_date FROM analytics_data ORDER BY analysis_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT product_name, efficiency_rating FROM supply_chain_efficiency ORDER BY efficiency_rating DESC
SELECT * FROM cost_saving_opportunities;
SELECT opportunity_description, cost_savings_amount FROM cost_saving_opportunities WHERE cost_savings_amount > 5000;
SELECT opportunity_id, opportunity_description FROM cost_saving_opportunities WHERE analysis_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY opportunity_id DESC;
SELECT efficiency_id, efficiency_metric, efficiency_score FROM supply_chain_efficiency WHERE efficiency_score < 80 ORDER BY efficiency_score ASC;
SELECT data_type, MAX(data_value) AS max_data_value FROM supply_chain_data GROUP BY data_type;
SELECT opportunity_description, cost_savings_amount FROM cost_saving_opportunities ORDER BY cost_savings_amount DESC
SELECT efficiency_metric, efficiency_score FROM supply_chain_efficiency WHERE efficiency_score > 80
SELECT data_type, SUM(data_value) AS total_value FROM supply_chain_data GROUP BY data_type
SELECT result_description FROM analytics_results WHERE result_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT * FROM supply_chain_data ORDER BY data_date DESC
SELECT * FROM cost_analysis ORDER BY cost_per_unit DESC, quantity_sold ASC
SELECT vendor_name, SUM(total_cost) AS total_cost FROM cost_analysis GROUP BY vendor_name
SELECT manufacturer_name, product_name, product_category FROM supply_chain WHERE unit_price > 50 ORDER BY product_category
SELECT * FROM cost_savings WHERE implementation_date >= '2022-01-01' AND implementation_date <= '2022-12-31'
SELECT supplier_name, AVG(order_quantity) AS avg_order_quantity FROM procurement_data GROUP BY supplier_name HAVING AVG(order_quantity) > 100
SELECT * FROM cost_analysis ORDER BY vendor_name ASC, cost_per_unit DESC
SELECT product_name, manufacturer_name FROM supply_chain WHERE unit_price > 100 ORDER BY product_name
SELECT supplier_name, order_quantity, order_date FROM procurement_data WHERE delivery_date > '2023-01-01'
SELECT metric_name, actual_value, performance_rating FROM efficiency_metrics WHERE performance_rating >= 8 ORDER BY performance_rating DESC
SELECT * FROM cost_savings WHERE implementation_date <= '2022-12-31' ORDER BY potential_savings DESC
